name: Onebrief
long_description:
Virtually everything in the military requires a planâ€”from everyday operations to war-time missions. With a rigorous process, many stakeholders, and rudimentary software (PowerPoint!!), planning is very slow. 

Onebrief is a collaborative software designed to make military planning fast. It turns every input into reusable building blocks and automatically keeps all planning artifacts in sync.
one_liner: Onebrief makes military headquarters run seamlessly
